analyzed: 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas la chags pa med pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no //
translated: The meaning of perfection is the absence of attachment to the compounded and the uncompounded.

analyzed: 'khor ba'i nyes pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no //
translated: The meaning of the perfections is the meaning of the realization of the faults of cyclic existence.

original: skye bo mi mkhas pa rnams khong du chud par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no //
analyzed: skye bo mi mkhas pa rnams khong du chud par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no //
translated: The meaning of the perfections is the meaning of the understanding of the unwise.

analyzed: chos kyi mdzod zad mi shes pa yang dag par ston pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no //
translated: The meaning of the perfections is the meaning of the teaching of the inexhaustible treasure of the Dharma.

original: sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no //

original: sems can gyi khams rab tu shes par bya ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no //
analyzed: sems can gyi khams rab tu shes par bya ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no //
translated: The meaning of the perfections is the meaning of the knowledge of the realm of sentient beings.

analyzed: sbyin pa mnyam pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa'i @280b don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no //

analyzed: tshul khrims mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no //

analyzed: bzod pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no //

analyzed: brtson 'grus mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no //
translated: The meaning of perfection is the meaning of the perfection of effort, which is the completion of the sameness of effort.

original: chos thams cad rab tu shes par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no //üîΩmi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no //
